data.comment: The big names in today's match at VEB Arena have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. CSKA Moscow with the kick-off.
In the minute 1, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 3, Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Nikola Vlasic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 6, Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Fedor Chalov of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 9, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at VEB Arena.
In the minute 13, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
In the minute 16, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Arsenal Tula's Abdul Mohammed misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 18, In Moscow CSKA Moscow attack through Nikola Vlasic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 18, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 25, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
Chidera Ejuke (CSKA Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Arsenal Tula's Gia Grigalava has been booked in Moscow.
In the minute 30, CSKA Moscow drive upfield and Fedor Chalov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 31, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Luka Djordjevic (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Important block from the Arsenal Tula defence as Nikola Vlasic fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 41, Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In the minute 43, Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Konstantin Kuchaev (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Arsenal Tula drives forward and Luka Djordjevic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, CSKA Moscow have been given a penalty at VEB Arena...
Panin Igor Nikolaevich will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Fedor Chalov.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich blows to start the second-half. Arsenal Tula with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luka Djordjevic for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 50, Goal! CSKA Moscow extend their lead to 2-0 through Nikola Vlasic.
Fedor Chalov instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 52, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
Gia Grigalava (Arsenal Tula) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 53, Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nikola Vlasic gets his shot on target but fails to score for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
In the minute 56, CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! Nikola Vlasic extends CSKA Moscow's lead to 3-0.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Ilzat Akhmetov replacing Alan Dzagoev.
In the minute 59, CSKA Moscow make their second substitution with Konstantin Maradishvili replacing Mario Fernandes.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
Kings Kangwa is replacing Kirill Panchenko for Arsenal Tula at VEB Arena.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
CSKA Moscow drive forward but Nikola Vlasic is judged offside.
In the minute 62, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke breaks free at VEB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Konstantin Kuchaev with Nayair Tiknizyan. This is the third substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's fourth substitution at VEB Arena with Adolfo Gaich replacing Chidera Ejuke.
In the minute 66, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Moscow.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich waits before resuming play because Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow is still down.
Goran Causic for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow push forward at VEB Arena and Ivan Oblyakov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Nikola Vlasic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 69, Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 72, Panin Igor Nikolaevich awards the away team a throw-in.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fedor Chalov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at VEB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 77, Kings Kangwa for Arsenal Tula is whistled offside.
Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
The away team replace Abdul Mohammed with Daniil Khlusevich.
In the minute 78, Luka Djordjevic keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
Daniil Khlusevich with an assist there.
Arnor Sigurdsson is replacing Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.
In the minute 80, Panin Igor Nikolaevich signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 82, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! CSKA Moscow extend their lead to 4-1 through Arnor Sigurdsson.
Great play from Nikola Vlasic to set up the goal.
In the minute 87, CSKA Moscow take a comfortable 5-1 lead thanks to Ivan Oblyakov.
That's a fine assist from Ilzat Akhmetov.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Panin Igor Nikolaevich.
In Moscow CSKA Moscow attack through Ilzat Akhmetov. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
That's full-time at VEB Arena. The final score is 5-1.
Robert Bauer is booked for the away team.
